author: cvs tylenol pm
content:
First of all I would like to say awesome blog! I had a quick question that 
I'd like to ask if you do not mind. I was curious to find out how you center yourself and clear 
your thoughts before writing. I've had a difficult 
time clearing my thoughts in getting my ideas out there.
I do enjoy writing but it just seems like the first 10 to 15 
minutes are generally lost just trying to figure out how to begin. Any 
recommendations or hints? Many thanks! https://tylenol1st.com/
